import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Button, Container } from "semantic-ui-react"; import { fetchCart } from "../redux/action/cart"; import { Link, Redirect, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { getImage } from "../utils"; import { FiChevronRight } from "react-icons/fi"; import { IoMdClose } from "react-icons/io"; import visaImg from "../assets/imgs/payments/logo_visa.png"; import mastercardImg from "../assets/imgs/payments/logo_mastercard.png"; import mpesaImg from "../assets/imgs/payments/logo_mpesa.png"; const Payment = ({ fetchCart, cart }) => { const [card, setCard] = useState(false); const [mpesa, setMpesa] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { fetchCart(); }, []); let cartItems = cart?.order_items; const history = useHistory(); if (cartItems?.length < 1) { return history.goBack(); } document.title = `Payment ( KSh. ${cart?.total} ) | Luxury Silk Online`; return ( <>

Please note:LuxurySilkPay will never ask you for your password, PIN, CVV or full card details over the phone or via email.
Need help? Contact us on{" "} https://www.luxurysilk.com/contact-us/

); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ cart: state.cart.shoppingCart, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { fetchCart })(Payment);
